name: Fortune Art Electricals
description: exporters of exclusive range of Insulat
overview:
Introduction: Established as a private limited firm, Fortune Art Electricals & Lighting Pvt. Ltd. is involved in manufacturing, supplying and exporting exclusive range of Cables & Wires and Induction Lights.

Our Infrastructure

We have with us modernized infrastructural facility that enables us to carry all our business processes with ease. We have sectioned our infrastructure into varied departments, thereby ensuring smooth functioning and timed execution. Our manufacturing units stretch across 70000 square ft. and 35000 square ft. and are installed with latest machines, cutting-edge tools and advanced machines. Our designing department is functional with sophisticated CAD/ CAM technology that enables us to offer products as per Global Designing Standards.

Why Us? / Our Strengths: With industrial experience of 3 decade, we have emerged as one of the prominent manufactures, suppliers and exporters of widespread array of Cables & Wires and Induction Lights.

Client Satisfaction: Premier aim of our organization is to render ‘Total Customer Satisfaction’. We offer our clients finest quality products that are in line with set industrial standards. We offer our products in large volumes keeping in mind the needs and demands of our clients.

Our Quality Assurance: We are a quality-focused organization involved in manufacturing, supplying as well as exporting quality-assured Cables & Wires and Induction Lights. We source our products from reliable vendors after conducting thorough market research and survey. Production process is carried under the strict quality control of our quality monitoring experts that enables us to offer quality-assured range of products in the market. We follow Total Quality Management (Total Quality Management) and are accredited with ISO 9001:2008 Certifications.
